description.narrative: The Project involves the construction of a 175 room full service four star Marriott hotel in Port-au-Prince (PaP), Haiti by Turgeau Developments S.A. The hotel will include a ballroom, meeting facilities, a full service restaurant, a swimming pool, and a fitness center among others.

The Project''s development impact is expected to include: - Development of business infrastructure of international standard in Port au Prince. - Creation of a significant number of jobs during the construction and operational phase. - Generation of downstream and upstream local supply linkages with the rest of the economy. - Increase of direct tax revenues by the government. - Improved environmental and social performance, including demonstration of solar water heating.

mailing-address.narrative: Aidan Killeen 151, angle Avenue Jean Paul II et Impasse Duverger Port-au-Prince Haiti Phone: +509 3711 1000 Email: mailto:aidan.killeen@digicelgroup.com

name.narrative: The project will be located in Turgeau, a district of Port-au-Prince, the capital city of Haiti.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.
